original: In a world where endless abundance was the norm, humanity lived in a utopia. Advanced artificial intelligence flawlessly catered to every person's needs, fulfilling every desire and ensuring a life of comfort. It seemed like a society straight out of fiction, where worries about resources, money, and scarcity had been eradicated forever. But one fateful day, the world woke up to an eerie silence a
